entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Fog. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
